pageContext.collection_description: Contains about 100 16" transcription discs of a wide range of programs, mostly from the mid-1940s, and hundreds of additional programs on cassette, reelto-reel tape and 8 track formats. The Rivers Family were the former owners of WSCS, Charleston, SC. As of 2005, the collection was in the process of being catalogued. Researchers looking for specific programs should contact the Museum.
